Summary Accomplished Software Engineer with over 15 years of experience in architecture, design and development on Windows and Linux including hardware validation and debug. Excellent RDBMS design and Web development skills. 
 
Developed JTAG based silicon debug tools using C on Linux, Python, C#, .NET and WinForms 
 
Developed Trigger and VISA(CPU signal Trace) tool using python and validated functionalities on a Veloce based FullChip emulation. Used Verdi extensively to walk the RTL code to understand features and functionalities 
 
Developed Enterprise class mission critical web and client/server applications using Microsoft stack of SQL Server, C#, WPF, ASP.net/ASP, HTML, XML, Javascript and Reporting 
 
Developed control network and management products using NeuronC firmware and VB GUI to build Echelon's LON based network.
